item.title: Hugo Tutorial
item.description: 1. Quick start install hugo sudo apt install hugo 2.1. Create a new site hugo new site myBlog cd myBlog 2.2.Add a theme git init git submodule add https://github.com/zwbetz-gh/minimal-bootstrap-hugo-theme.git themes/minimal-bootstrap-hugo-theme rm config.toml cp themes/minimal-bootstrap-hugo-theme/exampleSite/config.toml config.toml 2.3.Post your first article command hugo new posts/xxx.md will generate a xxx.md file in the directory content/posts/ hugo new posts/my-first-post.md 2.4.Add a tag for your posts add tags: ["tutorial"] in between two --- at the top of your .

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, here is Lin Sinan (林思南), a student in Statistics. master student in Data Science. I right now live in Espoo, Finland. Looking for internships/full-time jobs among gcc backend development, C++ software development and machine learning related positions. Github page: https://github.com/linsinan1995
